java/liquibase/database/DerbyDatabase.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseSnapshot;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DerbyDatabaseSnapshot;
00007 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00008 import liquibase.diff.DiffStatusListener;
00009 
00010 import java.sql.Connection;
00011 import java.sql.Types;
00012 import java.text.ParseException;
00013 import java.util.Set;
00014 
00015 public class DerbyDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {
00016 
00017     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00018         return "Apache Derby".equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00019     }
00020 
00021     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00022         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:derby")) {
00023             return "org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver";
00024         }
00025         return null;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getProductName() {
00029         return "Apache Derby";
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getTypeName() {
00033         return "derby";
00034     }
00035 
00036     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {//NOPMD
00037         return super.getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName().toUpperCase();
00038     }
00039 
00040     public boolean supportsSequences() {
00041         return false;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00045         return false;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getBooleanType() {
00049         return "SMALLINT";
00050     }
00051 
00052     public String getCurrencyType() {
00053         return "DECIMAL";
00054     }
00055 
00056     public String getUUIDType() {
00057         return "CHAR(36)";
00058     }
00059 
00060     public String getClobType() {
00061         return "CLOB";
00062     }
00063 
00064     public String getBlobType() {
00065         return "BLOB";
00066     }
00067 
00068     public String getDateTimeType() {
00069         return "TIMESTAMP";
00070     }
00071 
00072     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00073         return "CURRENT_TIMESTAMP";
00074     }
00075 
00076     public String getFalseBooleanValue() {
00077         return "0";
00078     }
00079 
00080     public String getTrueBooleanValue() {
00081         return "1";
00082     }
00083 
00084     public String getAutoIncrementClause() {
00085         return "GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY";
00086     }
00087 
00088 
00089     public String getDateLiteral(String isoDate) {
00090         if (isDateOnly(isoDate)) {
00091             return "DATE(" + super.getDateLiteral(isoDate) + ")";
00092         } else if (isTimeOnly(isoDate)) {
00093             return "TIME(" + super.getDateLiteral(isoDate) + ")";
00094         } else {
00095             String dateString = super.getDateLiteral(isoDate);
00096             int decimalDigits = dateString.length() - dateString.indexOf('.') - 2;
00097             String padding = "";
00098             for (int i=6; i> decimalDigits; i--) {
00099                 padding += "0";
00100             }
00101             return "TIMESTAMP(" + dateString.replaceFirst("'$", padding+"'") + ")";
00102         }
00103     }
00104 
00105     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00106         return false;
00107     }
00108 
00109     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00110         return new RawSqlStatement("select V.VIEWDEFINITION from SYS.SYSVIEWS V, SYS.SYSTABLES T, SYS.SYSSCHEMAS S WHERE  V.TABLEID=T.TABLEID AND T.SCHEMAID=S.SCHEMAID AND T.TABLETYPE='V' AND T.TABLENAME='" + name + "' AND S.SCHEMANAME='"+convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName)+"'");
00111     }
00112 
00113 
00114     public String getViewDefinition(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00115         return super.getViewDefinition(schemaName, name).replaceFirst("CREATE VIEW \\w+ AS ", "");
00116     }
00117 
00118     public void setConnection(Connection conn) {
00119         super.setConnection(new DerbyConnectionDelegate(conn));
00120     }
00121 
00122     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00123         if (defaultValue != null && defaultValue instanceof String) {
00124             if (dataType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00125                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^TIMESTAMP\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00126             } else if (dataType == Types.DATE) {
00127                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^DATE\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00128             } else if (dataType == Types.TIME) {
00129                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^TIME\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00130             }
00131         }
00132         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00133     }
00134 
00135     public DatabaseSnapshot createDatabaseSnapshot(String schema, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00136         return new DerbyDatabaseSnapshot(this, statusListeners, schema);
00137     }
00138 }
